text: The Lake House is a 2006 American fantasy romantic drama movie directed by Alejandro Agresti. It stars Keanu Reeves and Sandra Bullock with Christopher Plummer. It was written by David Auburn. It is about an architect living in 2004 from Chicago and a doctor living in 2006 who meet through letters left in a mailbox at the lake house in Wisconsin where they have lived at separate points in time. ==References== Category:2006 romantic drama movies Category:2006 fantasy movies Category:2000s American fantasy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies shot in Chicago Category:Movies set in Chicago
title: The Lake House (movie)
